item.title: Forbes Magazine features the Austrian Startup Scene
item.description: Forbesis one of the top magazines on business related topics. It published an interesting article called “Scaling Alpine Heights: Austria’s Startup Scene“on the Austrian Startup Scene. The following statement attracted my attention: “The country is enjoying something of an entrepreneurial renaissance, driven largely by the return of some highly successful founders whose presence has awoken its capital Vienna from a start-up winter sleep.” [by Forbes] The Austrian startups that made it to the article are the following ones (details on the startups can be found in the article and on their corresponding website):
